title: 1 Bedroom + Den Apartment at Aura | 55+ Community | One Month Free!
posting_body: ['Receive', 'one month with no rent', 'when you move into any', '1 Bedroom + Den', 'or', '2 Bedroom', 'home within', '120 days of your application.', 'Plus,', 'receive an additional', '$250 off', 'when you move in before', 'Septmeber 1st.', '*Available for a limited time and subject to change.', 'Terms and conditions apply.', 'Must sign a 12 month lease or longer to qualify.', '1 Bedroom 1 Bathroom + Den | 867 Square Feet | Starting at $1,724/month*', '*Prices and availability are subject to change.', 'Schedule your private tour:', 'show contact info', 'Visit our website for more information: <URL>', 'Your Aura is your distinctive atmosphere surrounding you.', 'Serving the', '55+ community', ', life at Aura provides the comfort and convenience to let that energy blossom.', 'With six unique layouts of studio, 1-bedroom, 1-bedroom + den, and 2-bedroom floor plans, each residence features granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and GE® ENERGY STAR® in-home washer and dryer.', 'Enhance your lifestyle with our expansive amenities including Game Lounge and Club Room, Family Room, Fitness Center and Yoga/Group Fitness Studio, Indoor Pool, Community Garden, and two Outdoor Patios designed for indoor/outdoor entertaining.', 'Across the street from Fridley Transit Station, Aura offers direct access to downtown Minneapolis in less than 20 minutes.', 'Find all of your home and food needs just half a mile down the road at Fridley Market shopping center or spend the day exploring Springbrook Nature Center and the abundance of Fridley’s neighborhood parks and trails steps from your front door.', 'Experience life in full bloom, at Aura.', 'HOME AMENITIES', 'FULLY FURNISHED KITCHEN WITH:', '•\tGRANITE COUNTERTOPS', '•\tSTAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES', '•\tSUBWAY TILE KITCHEN BACKSPLASH', '•\tGE® ENERGY STAR® REFRIGERATOR-FREEZER W/ ICEMAKER', '•\tGE® ELECTRIC OVEN & RANGE W/ 4-BURNER COOKTOP', '•\tGE® DISHWASHER', '•\tGE® MICROWAVE', '•\tGARBAGE DISPOSAL', 'BUILT-IN LINEN CLOSET', 'GE® ENERGY STAR® IN-HOME WASHER AND DRYER', 'LARGE WINDOWS WITH NATURAL LIGHT', 'AMPLE OUTLETS', 'WOOD-LOOK LVT FLOORING IN KITCHEN, LIVING SPACE, AND BATHROOMS', 'PLUSH CARPET IN BEDROOMS', 'BLACK MATTE ACCENT LIGHT FIXTURES', 'BRUSHED NICKEL HARDWARE', 'GLASS SHOWER ENCLOSURE', 'BUILDING AMENITIES', 'LOBBY', 'GAME LOUNGE', 'CLUB ROOM WITH BILLARDS TABLE', 'FAMILY ROOM WITH FULL KITCHEN AND CHILDREN PLAY AREA', '24-HOUR FITNESS CENTER', 'PRIVATE YOGA/GROUP FITNESS ROOM', 'INDOOR POOL', 'TWO OUTDOOR PATIOS', 'PICKLEBALL COURT', 'COMMUNITY GARDEN', 'PRIVATE WALKING TRAIL', 'UNDERGROUND PARKING & SURFACE LOT PARKING', 'PRIVATE RESIDENT STORAGE', 'PRIVATE DOG PARK', 'INTERIOR BIKE STORAGE', 'ELECTRONIC PACKAGE CONCIERGE', 'CONTROLLED ACCESS ENTRY', 'WI-FI IN ALL COMMON AREAS', 'ON-SITE PROFFESSIONAL MANAGEMENT', '24/7 EMERGENCY MAINTENANCE', 'PET FRIENDLY', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
